content.text:
# Japan Ranking Circuit Tournament

The Japan Ranking Circuit Tournament (日本ランキングサーキット大会)  is a national badminton tournament organized by the Nippon Badminton Association. It is a tournament that is eligible for ranking points in the Japan Rankings.
